original_title: UFO Cover-Up Live with Larry King
overview: Two-hour Larry King Special, produced by CNN but broadcast on TNT. Larry King brings his talk show to the desert outside Area 51 for a live broadcast. In a combination of live panel interviews and prerecorded inserts, the show explores the evidence for UFOs and the alleged government cover-up of UFO information.
title: UFO Cover-Up Live with Larry King
